The '''Church of Favonius,''' managed by the [[Knights of Favonius]],<ref>{{Ref/VO|Jean|About Barbara}}</ref> is an organization whose members are the devoted adherents of the [[Barbatos|Anemo Archon]]. They manage the [[Favonius Cathedral]], where many of its members work and pray.
